ing: 1 1/2 tablespoons mixed fresh herbs (such as parsley, oregano, thyme, savory, rosemary), divided

des: "Creamy mascarpone mixed with lots of herbs is served on Garlic Parmesan Pretzel CrispsÂ® and topped with a blend of grated cheese and more fresh herbs."
ins: In a small bowl mix together mascarpone, one tablespoon herbs and pepper till well blended. Combine the Cheddar, Havarti and Parmesan in a separate bowl. Top Pretzel CrispsÂ® with a dollop of mascarpone mixture and then sprinkle with cheese blend and remaining herbs.
